item.title: Cyber Interest - Jan 2024
item.description: Did this work? It seems so. So, here’s a couple of interesting articles and outcomes from January 24, this page will be updated as the month progresses Microsoft Defender MP Scan Logs Used for DFIR (3rd Jan 2024) CrowdStrike give an example of Defender scan logs being useful - Brief here I will be providing an example in Splunk in the coming days on ingesting and triaging this telemetry Scheduled Task Tampering by Chinese APT Hafnium (3rd Jan 2024) Excellent article by Purple Team, which is a new resource to me personally.
